mapper.insert: insert into membership_table (userName, userId, userPassword, userBirth, userPhone, userEmail, userPostcode, userAddress, userDetailAddress, userExtraAddress) values (#{userName}, #{userId}, #{userPassword}, #{userBirth}, #{userPhone}, #{userEmail}, #{userPostcode}, #{userAddress}, #{userDetailAddress}, #{userExtraAddress})
mapper.select: select userName, userId, userPhone, userEmail, userPostcode, userAddress, userDetailAddress, userExtraAddress from membership_table where 1=1 and userId = #{userId} and userPassword = #{userPassword}
select userId from membership_table where 1=1 and userName=#{userName} and userPhone=#{userPhone};
